attributes.action: Vote in no confidence in Nicola sturgeon as first minister of Scotland
attributes.background: Nicola sturgeon is in unable to act out duties as a first minister due to her incompetence to get on with her day job that she was elected for and to try and defy the will of the British people twice or to go against 2014 referendum and the 2016 referendum.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
